content:
According to the specified information, at least 27 members of the crew of the Russian ship of the Russian ship "Sergey Kotov" were injured in varying degrees of severity.

About thisreported March 6Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

GUR reminded that irreversible losses among the personnel of the enemy vessel, according to preliminary data, - 7 sailors.

BeforeIt was reportedthat there are no Russian ships in the Black Sea after the destruction of "Sergey Kotov".
title: GUR: During the destruction of "Sergey Kotov", at least 27 invaders were injured
description: This was reported on March 6 by the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. ...
author: Army Inform
